item.description:
The movie this month is a dry comedy, marginally Humanistic and definitely tinged with an atheist slant. Not too many of these out there! "The Invention of Lying" was made be comedian Ricky Gervais.

"In a world where no one fibs, fiction doesn't exist and people take each other at their literal word, unsuccessful screenwriter Mark (Ricky Gervais) gains fame and fortune -- and maybe the girl of his dreams (Jennifer Garner) -- by saying things that aren't true." -Netflix

The program is scheduled to start at 7 at the UU Church of Worcester, with doors opening at 6:30 for socializing and conversation. Please watch this page for changes.
item.name: Movie Night: The Invention of Lying
